article_title: How Maximus doubled federal revenues -- Washington Technology
article_text: In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters. You can also download it into a spreadsheet. Our databases track awards back to 2013. Read More

article_metadata.keywords: Maximus Federal Services, Thomas Romeo, government contracting, business process management, BPM, outsourcing, outcome-based contracts

og.description: In the last four years, Maximus has seen its federal business nearly double under the leadership of Thomas Romeo, and it's thanks to the company's focus on its customers' outcomes and not the process.
og.title: How Maximus doubled federal revenues -- Washington Technology

article_metadata.description: In the last four years, Maximus has seen its federal business nearly double under the leadership of Thomas Romeo, and it's thanks to the company's focus on its customers' outcomes and not the process.

article_summary:
Our databases track awards back to 2013.
In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters.
You can also download it into a spreadsheet.
